name: PANEL RABBIT
description:
Place the panels on the ground and Guide the rabbit safely to the goal!

Story
Rabbits who were living in a peaceful forest,blown away by a big storm.
The pink rabbit, who was left behind, travels to the outside world to find his friends.




Basic Rules
Place the panels on the ground so that the rabbit can reach the goal panel.





When placing panels, be careful to avoid encountering natural enemies such as bears and foxes.
To avoid encountering natural enemies , place panels while keeping an eye on the direction in which they are moving.




Gathering Friends
As the game progresses, you will find your straggler friends.
You can also play with your fellow rabbits by giving them carrots that you pick up on stage, and they can switch places with the pink rabbit.
